72  const std::vector<plFloat>& get_alpha()const
73  {
74  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
75  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plBayesLearnPoisson::get_alpha");
76 
77  return alpha_;
78  }
79 
83  plDistribution get_aposteriori_distribution(const plVariablesConjunction &params_variable) const;
84

88 
93  template<typename T>
94  void get_probability(T *table)const
95  {
96  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
97  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plBayesLearnProbTable::get_probability'");
98 
99  plProbValue sum = PL_ZERO_PROB;
100  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < alpha_.size(); ++i) sum += alpha_[i];
101 
102  if(sum > PL_ZERO_PROB) {
103  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < alpha_.size(); ++i) table[i] = alpha_[i]/sum;
104  }
105  else {
106  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < alpha_.size(); ++i) table[i] = PL_ZERO_PROB;
107  }
108  }
109 
110 
114  template<typename T>
115  void get_probability(std::vector <T> &table)const
116  {
117  if(!alpha_.empty()){
118  table.resize(alpha_.size());
119  get_probability(&(table[0]));
120  }
121  else
122  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plBayesLearnProbTable::get_probability'");
123  }
124 
125  void get_parameters(plValues &params) const
126  {
127  std::vector <plProbValue> table;
128  get_probability(table);
129 
130  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < table.size(); ++i){
131  params[i] = plFloat(table[i]);
132  }
133  }
134 
135  unsigned int get_n_parameters()const
136  {
137  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
138  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plBayesLearnProbTable::get_n_parameters");
139 
140  return alpha_.size()-1;
141  }
142 
143  virtual plLearnObject* clone()const
144  {
145  return new plBayesLearnProbTable(*this);
146  }
147 
148 
149 protected:
150 
151  bool internal_addPoint(const plDataValues &point, plFloat weight);
152 
153  explicit plBayesLearnProbTable(const plVariablesConjunction &vars);
154 
155  virtual void Output(std::ostream &out) const;
156

159

165 };
